title: Statoil reports for 2004  - equinor.com
content:
Statoil reports for 2004 

March 31, 2005, 10:15 CEST

Statoil (OSE: STL, NYSE: STO) is today, 31 March, publishing the electronic versions of its annual, sustainability and US Form 20F reports for 2004.

These documents are available on the group’s web site at www.statoil.com/ir.

The HTML version of the Form 20F report will be available on the US Securities and Exchange Commission web site in the Edgar database at www.sec.gov from 16.00 today.

Printed copies of the annual and sustainability reports will be mailed to all shareholders from 11 April.

Further information from:

Mari Thjømøe, senior vice president investor relations, tel: +47 90 77 78 24 (mobile), +47 51 99 77 90 (office)

Nina Koch, public affairs manager, tel: +47 95 92 93 91 (mobile), +47 51 99 17 60 (office)
